EmailTemplate.name: Review and Approved Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: Registered Service Agent (RSA) Exam â€“ License Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Service Agent examination data for {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.MiddleName} {!Contact.LastName} has been reviewed and approved by the RSA Administrator. Please login to the RSA Portal to view your account, including your updated license information. Once logged in, click Agent Profile, then select Print License to print a copy of your renewed Service Agent License.
This license is valid through {!Contact.License_To_Date__c}.
For RSA Program information, please visit CDFA - DMS - Registered Service Agency (ca.gov).
RSA Administrator Division of Measurement Standards California Department of Food and Agriculture
Questions? Please contact us at rsa@cdfa.ca.gov .
